Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides refuge for 11 Black, Asian, Minority Ethnic and Refugee (BAMER) women (with or without children) fleeing abuse. Offers the service to other women, but priority is given to BME women. Offers advice and support to residents and aftercare provision for those leaving the refuge. Provides an outreach service which supports ex-refuge residents who have been rehoused and also provides telephone support to those experiencing domestic abuse. Also provides support in partnership with the Poppy Project, to 9 women trafficked into the UK. Self or any referral.

Langs.entry: Arabic, Bengali, French, Gujurati, Hindi, Punjabi, Urdu
